features: 【Android 13 and 8GB RAM 64GB (Up to 1TB) ROM】UMIDIGI G2 Tab is equipped with the latest Android 13 system, which is faster, smoother, and safer than Android 12. With a quad-core processor, 4GB+4GB expand RAM, and 64GB storage, running stably. It easily expands to 1TB with a SD card perfectly suited to hold photos, movies, and songs without worrying about running out of space.

【6000mAh Long-Lasting Battery and Eye Protection Split Screen】The 6000mAh long-lasting battery empowers your kids to have fun all day. 10.1-inch kids tablet HD 1280x800 display screen is designed with low blue light technology protecting your kids' eyes. Split screen mode allows you to open two different apps on one screen at the same time. It makes it easy to take notes and work while listening to music and easily handles more problems, and improves work efficiency.

【8MP+8MP Dual Camera and WiFi 6】G2 tab Android tablet with excellent 8MP rear camera + 8MP front camerato help you record beautiful moments. The front 8MP camera provides a clearer portrait for video calls; Our kids' tablet also supports Wi-Fi 6 with transmission speeds up to 9.6Gbps making connections more stable and fast. Ensure that you are browsing web pages and loading videos more smoothly.

【High-Performance Tablets】UMIDIGI G2 tablet inclede dual-speaker, split-screen function, Bluetooth 5.0,Android 13 Tablet with 3.5mm headphone jack，support OTG, Suitable for work, online classes, entertainment, photography, watching movies, and more. Satisfy most of your daily needs.

【Customer Service】The tablets are the best gift for your family. If you have any questions while using the tablet, please feel free to contact us. Our professional customer service will reply and help you within 24 hours. Please note that our tablets do not support face ID unlock, only password or pattern unlock!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, Ideal for media consumption
reviews.reviewText: I'm pretty happy with this tablet, especially considering the price. It's perfect for media consumption. Solid build quality, and it comes with a screen protector and clear silicone case. The screen is big and bright. I really appreciate the long battery life. Setup was fast and straightforward. I had no problem connecting or staying connected to WiFi or bluetooth. I don't have a WiFi 6 router yet, but I plan to upgrade soon, so I'm excited about the WiFi 6 capability.The biggest drawback is the responsiveness. Or lack of. It's not a snappy tablet. There is a few milliseconds delay when I access the keyboard. I tried doing my Duolingo language lessons on it, but the constant delays to access the keyboard and microphone for speech recognition were frustrating enough that I'll opt to use my phone instead. It's probably a very negligible delay, but if you're used to a faster mobile device, it's noticeable.I didn't expect the weight. For comparison, it weighs 576g and the Amazon Fire HD 10 weighs 465g. Not really a plus or minus for me, just something notable.I tried testing its limits by installing a fairly demanding action game (Genshin). Surprisingly, it ran, but unsurprisingly, it really struggled during combat. I'm sure lighter games would be fine.I put in a 128GB SD card, but there is no option to use it as internal storage. Meaning I can't install apps on it, only store files. I see another reviewer saying they're running apps off the sd card, so hopefully its just something I need to figure out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good price for a 10.1 in. Tablet!
reviews.reviewText: I do like my new tablet for the price I paid. The only beef I have is the batter life when playing casual games which is why I wanted a tablet. I needed to give my cell phone a break.It's an up to date android 13 with Google which I use. The visual images are clear and I can customize the layout settings to suit me. I use it for hours playinggames but have had the battery completely drain and shut down.So I switch back and forth from tablet to phone when recharging each device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Android 13 Tablet
reviews.reviewText: Umidigi G2 Tab is a great product. Its powerful and fast. Comes with a 2GHz processor and 4GB RAM, good enough to handle most aops and games in my testing. Has 64GB internal storage of which 51GB is available which is great. The dual speaker produces good dynamic stereo sound. Has 8M front and rear camera that take good pictures. Display is bright with good color depth. Screen resolution could have been better for 10.1 table but its good considering the price point. No issues connecting to Wifi and Bluetooth Devices, all works fine.Overall an excellent tablet and a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing is quality!! Great tablet!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Been using this tablet as a spare for my regular one. I think this will be my main one now. The G2 is a powerful Android tablet with a crystal clear display. The Quad-Core Processor is super fast and has no lag. It’s stylish with some weight to it. I like how it came with a free rubber tablet case already installed on it. It has a really clean look to it. You’ll like this one y’all! Give it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was hopeful but this is disappointing because it is so fare unable to connect with any Bluetooth device I own. Also way slow to start up. Not compatible with Samsung wearable. Netflix work ok. The interface is subpare for Android device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars its very good with Roblox and gaming
reviews.reviewText: i wanted to use this tablet for gaming it quit perfect for that overall its good less lag very well built very good tablet if you child wants to use it for Roblox!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent value at very low price point
reviews.reviewText: Received my UMIDIGI Android 13 Tablet today. On slow side, but what does one expect at this price point? Wirelessly downloading my apps and data from Android phone was a bit difficult; had trouble finding the device and VERY slow. But I finally figured it out. I don't do any biz work anymore, so I basically use it to view photos, read e-newspapers, follow scores, and a little social media. So this is all I need, although I do wish i was just a tad faster. But the prices of other tablets being what they are and this being like my 5th tablet in 10 years, if I get 3 years from this one I'll be thrilled. If it breaks, at this price I'll just toss it and buy another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A bargain entertainment tablet
reviews.reviewText: Similar specs on another model from this company did not get 5 stars but this one has a lower price that makes it an awesome value for the money. I use this tablet for entertainment: watch Ching videos, social media, etc. It has a nice big, bright screen, 4 GB of RAM, lots of storage for downloading videos, and decent performance from the processor. Screen protector and plastic case are included in the price as are the charging cable and power brick. Importantly for me, there is a headphone jack. The only minor downsides I saw are that the processor gets a little warm and the battery longevity is only good, not great (as the specs kind of suggested), but a tablet without those downsides would and should cost substantially more.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelent Tablet for content consumption - Price is unbeatable
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought it just before my vacation as I did not want to be traveling with my Laptop and I wanted a bigger screen than my phone for emails, browsing, reading news, researching things to do during the trip, and consuming Netflix and other entertainment subscription sources.I almost bought a higher-priced option, but I do not regret buying it at all, the price is exactly right. The specs are very decent, and it makes it perfect for my intended use. It is just what I needed. The speed/performance is decent, and it does not get Hot.I am very happy with the Umidigi G2 Tab purchase, it has Android 13, it can run all the apps I tried, comes with a silicone case included, and has a screen protector installed.I was able to use it during the trip, inside the plane as a replacement for the entertainment systems which planes don't have anymore, and now that I am back, it is a pretty decent backup option when my wife is watching something on TV, and I want to watch something else. I also use it to have news in the background while I am working from home.The setup procedure was pretty easy, and it imported all the installed apps from my phone and installed them from the Play Store. It took a couple of hours to be ready, but no effort was needed from me during that time. Just smooth. I could use it with all my Bluetooth headphones (I have a few from assorted brands).The battery lasts a long time, although I was charging it daily during the trip so I would not be out of battery, I was being extra careful as I believe 3 days would be achievable with my normal use.The 8MP camera (front and back) are decent, but my phone camera is better and convenient, I ended up using the tablet camera just for WhatsApp calls.I did add a MicroSD card I had around to it just to have some extra storage space on it.The only minor detail I found was that I could not charge it with pure USB-C cables. Only USB-A to USB-C worked to charge it, but that is not a problem as one cable and a charger are included in the package. I just used the cable included and any other charger worked as well.Edit: Added a video to illustrate responsiveness.
la tablette est ce que j'attendais. Elle fait son travail on verra avec le temps mais pour le moment elle me satisfait amplement je la recommande surtout qualité prix plus que correct
家で使用するサブ端末として活躍しています。画面サイズが大きいのも相まって、やはり重さはタブレットやスマホの中だと重いと感じます小さい子向けのシステムも初期から搭載されていて、子供用には問題ないと思います。性能もよくはないので、3dゲームなどはスペック不足で動きません。漫画を見るにしても重いので長時間使用すると疲れます。消去法でスタンドを使用して動画を見る用途になりました
動画を見るだけなので、何の不具合もなく使えてます失礼ながら、意外と見てくれも良いです

The Umidigi Tab 2 only comes in one colour, an attractive dark blue. Packaging is simple but effectively protected by dense foam blocks on the bottom and a thin open foam pad on the top. It has a textured back surface that feels good and is non-slip. Screen is big at 10.1" but there is large bezels. Design overall looks good, but the camera bump sticks out so a case may be a necessity. 2A charger is just adequate for a 6000mAh battery. Speakers are located on bottom of the short side, so sub-optimal for landscape video viewing. Not really suited for high volume listening but there is a headphone jack. Quad core cpu provides okay but not snappy performance. 64Gb of storage is minimal but there is a micro-sd slot. Interestingly Google sees it as a SonyEricsson Xperia Neo V. Overall decent for the budget segment.
